General.Name: Sinopec Shandong Taishan Petroleum Co Ltd
General.Description: SINOPEC Shandong Taishan Pectroleum Co.,Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail business of refined oil products and natural gas refueling business in China. The company's principal products include gasoline, diesel oil, natural gas, lubricating oil, and other petrochemicals. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taian, China.
